activities: Emergency management information pushed or pulled thought cellular phone app in an emergency. Information collected is only location and profile, as outlined in EULA of the product at the time of download. In the event of an emergency, the user receives information related to the incident (Fire, Bomb etc..) and provides feedback of their safety.
eucountries: France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Spain, United Kingdom
personaldata: All data is covered. We only have geo location and profile information related to public safety response in the event of an emergency.
recoursemech: Patrocinium has chosen the EU Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) to serve as an independent recourse mechanism (IRM) for dispute resolution arising from collection, use, and retention of personal information transferred from EU member countries to companies in the United States
